ninja.bytecode.shuriken.bukkit.api.particle

Interface VisualEffect

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColoredParticleEffect, LineParticleManipulator, ParticleManipulator, PhantomEffect, SphereParticleManipulator, SystemEffect

    public interface VisualEffect
    A visual effect which may be an actual effect, or a super-effect (multiple sub effects) Allows you to play them simply, even though there could be hundreds of meta-visual effects within a super visual effect

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEffect(VisualEffect e)
      Add a visual effect to this effect.
      ninja.bytecode.shuriken.collections.KList<VisualEffect> getEffects()
      Get all effects in this visual effect
      void play(org.bukkit.Location l)
      Play this effect.

    • Method Detail

      • getEffects

        ninja.bytecode.shuriken.collections.KList<VisualEffect> getEffects()
        Get all effects in this visual effect
        Returns:
        the effects

      • play

        void play(org.bukkit.Location l)
        Play this effect. Will loop through all visual effects and play them, or play itself
        Parameters:
        l - the location to play the effect

      • addEffect

        void addEffect(VisualEffect e)
        Add a visual effect to this effect. Nothing will happen unless this is a System effect
        Parameters:
        e - the effect
